supportDesc.support:
east face of pier a11, in black Ink. dimensions 23 cm wide × 40 cm high.
dipinto of the bust of a gladiator located at the eastern face of pier a11, looking into Bay 1. The ink is mostly faded. The bust, seen from behind, is drawn in three-quarter, turned to the left. The image can be identified as a large crested gladiatorial helmet and a breastplate that covers also part of the back. The dipinto was probably meant to be a close-up of the gladiator depicted in D1.2.
